bibl.title: A Reconstructed Land Survey from Kerkeosiris.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Part of the outline cadastral survey carried out in September 119 BCE of the lands of Kerkeosiris, copied by the village scribe Menches as a guide for a subsequent fiscal register of crops.
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Tebt. I, 84b + P. Tebt. IV, 1117c = P. Bagnall 46
Dominic Rathbone, Dorothy J. Thompson, & Arthur Verhoogt, A Reconstructed Land Survey from Kerkeosiris.
Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 243-265.
Part of the outline cadastral survey carried out in September 119 BCE of the lands of Kerkeosiris, copied by the village scribe Menches as a guide for a subsequent fiscal register of crops.
